See also: Lawyers in Poland
This list about a living person needs additional citations for verification. Please help by adding reliable sources. Contentious material about living persons that is unsourced or poorly sourced must be removed immediately, especially if potentially libelous or harmful. (October 2012) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a dynamic list and may never be able to satisfy particular standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it with reliably sourced entries.

  1. ^ [clarification needed] Database (n.d.). "Adw. Joanna Agacka-Indecka, prezes Naczelnej Rady Adwokackiej od 2007 r." (in Polish). Polish Bar Council. Retrieved 4 October 2012. .

  4. ^ "OBM History". Retrieved 4 May 2007. 
  5. ^ [clarification needed] "Towarzystwa Szkół Zjednoczonego Świata – Historia" (in Polish). Retrieved 4 May 2007.
